message.content: {"given_definition_quality":90,"better_definition":"school building","sentence":"教学楼在那儿。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animation style image of a modern school building with large windows, surrounded by a small green area, under a cloudy sky with a faint sunlight breaking through. The atmosphere feels calm and slightly surreal, with hints of nature reclaiming the area. Some gentle mist and small plants are growing near the base of the building.","sentence_translation":"The school building is there."}
